title: 10 HIDDEN Things Developers KNEW We Would Try
description:
Sometimes game creators can anticipate all of the weirder things players will attempt in games. Here are some clever examples.
Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/gameranxTV?sub_confirmation=1

0:00 Intro 
0:23  Resident Evil 4 Remake - Clear out rubble with a rocket launcher 
1:37 Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Skip the Shrine 
2:47 Bioshock Infinite 
4:17 Deadpool 
5:27  The Evil Within 
6:12 Psychonauts 2 
7:22 Metal Gear Solid 5 
8:42 Red Dead Redemption 2 
10:40 Tunic
